properties.name: Helsinki
properties.description: The capital city of Finland, known for its design district, vibrant culture, and historic sites.
properties.message: Visit the Helsinki Cathedral, Suomenlinna Fortress, and the Design District.

properties.name: Rovaniemi
properties.description: The official hometown of Santa Claus, located in the Arctic Circle.
properties.message: Visit Santa Claus Village, Arktikum Science Museum, and enjoy the Northern Lights.

properties.name: Turku
properties.description: The oldest city in Finland, known for its medieval castle and vibrant maritime culture.
properties.message: Visit the Turku Castle, Turku Archipelago, and the Turku Cathedral.

properties.name: Savonlinna
properties.description: Famous for the Olavinlinna Castle and the annual Savonlinna Opera Festival.
properties.message: Visit Olavinlinna Castle and enjoy the Savonlinna Opera Festival.

properties.name: Lapland
properties.description: A region known for its stunning natural beauty, winter sports, and Sami culture.
properties.message: Experience the Northern Lights, visit a reindeer farm, and explore the wilderness.
